column6: After an unfortunate accident, the Absorbing Man is released from custody and runs rampant on the city! With no options left, the students of the Avengers Academy must assemble against a foe that even their teachers cannot defeat. Fly or flunk!
column7: | Hank Pym | Reptil | Tigra (Greer Nelson) | Wasp
column8: | writer:Christos Gage | penciler:Mike McKone | penciler:Tom Raney
